main_window.title: T2 Tarkov Toolbox
main_window.restart_prompt:
Language setting saved!

Please manually close and restart the application for changes to take effect.

version_check.available:
New version {version} is available!

Click the red version number in the toolbar to visit the download page.
version_check.error:
Failed to check for updates: {error}

Please check your network connection or try again later.

sidebar.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this preset?

overlay_compensation.title: Overlay Compensation
overlay_compensation.description: When overlay and filter are both active, overlay may be overexposed. Adjust these:

hotkeys.title: Hotkey Settings
hotkeys.set_prompt: Press the hotkey to bind to '{preset_name}'...

messages.save_success: Preset, hotkeys, and monitor settings saved
messages.hotkey_conflict_detail:
Hotkey {key_name} is already used by preset '{conflict_name}'
Please select another hotkey
messages.hotkey_set_success:
Hotkey has been set to: {key_name}
Please click 'Save Changes' to save the configuration
messages.reset_defaults_confirm:
Are you sure you want to reset to default presets?
This will delete all custom presets.

calibration.calibration_info:
Calibration Points: {count}/3
Click on the map to add calibration points
calibration.calibration_info_with_status:
Calibration Points: {count}/3 ({status})
Click on the map to add calibration points
calibration.mode_active:
Calibration Mode: Take a screenshot in the game,
 then click the corresponding position on the map
calibration.deletion_mode_active:
Deletion Mode: Click on calibration points
on the map to delete them

floor_regions.title: Floor Region Marking
floor_regions.hint:
Only for floor maps
Mark activation regions on the large map
floor_regions.marking_mode_active:
Region Marking Mode: Click on the large map to mark points
Current Points: {count} (at least 3 points required)
floor_regions.marking_mode_boundary: Region Marking Mode: Click to mark region boundary points on the large map (currently {count} points)
floor_regions.marking_status:
Region Marking Mode: Click to mark points on the large map
Current Points: {count} ({status})

status.please_select_import: Please select a map and import a map image
status.no_layer_configured: The map has not been configured with layers, please import a map image first
status.map_file_not_exist: Map image file does not exist: {path}
status.loaded_calibrated: Loaded: {map_name} - {layer_name} (Calibrated, position tracking can be enabled)
status.tracking_enabled_status: Position tracking enabled - screenshots in game will automatically show position
status.screenshot_detected:
Screenshot detected: Position {position}, Height {height}m
Auto-selected layer: {layer_name} ({layer_type}) - Click the corresponding position on the map
status.transform_failed: Screenshot detected but coordinate transformation failed: {error}

layer_management.title: Layer Management
layer_management.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete layer '{layer_name}'?

messages.select_configure_map: Please select and configure a map first
messages.layer_not_calibrated: The current map layer has not been calibrated, please complete calibration first
messages.screenshot_path_not_set: Screenshot path not configured, please set it in Global Settings
messages.tracking_enabled: Position tracking enabled - screenshots in game will automatically show position
messages.calibration_point_enough:
You have added {count} calibration points.
You can now exit calibration mode to test
messages.clear_calibration_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all calibration points?
messages.calibration_cleared: All calibration points have been cleared
messages.no_calibration_point_nearby:
No calibration points nearby
(Maximum search distance: 20 pixels)
messages.cannot_mark_base_map:
Big map does not need to mark regions
Region marking is only used for layer
messages.no_base_map_configured:
This map has not been imported as base map
Please import base map first
messages.base_map_not_exist: Base map file does not exist: {base_map_path}
messages.region_points_not_enough: You need at least 3 points to define a region
messages.region_overlap_warning:
Region overlap detected!

This region belongs to layer {owner_layer_id}: {owner_layer_name}

Do you want to reuse this region?
Yes: Bind to this region
No: Cancel this operation
messages.region_saved:
Region marking saved
Contains {count} boundary points
messages.layer_has_no_region: Current layer has no region bound
messages.unbind_region_confirm:
Current layer references the region from {owner_info}

Do you want to unbind it?
messages.cannot_delete_base_map: Cannot delete the base map (ground floor)
messages.delete_layer_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete the following layer?

Layer {layer_id}: {layer_name}
messages.irreversible_action_warning: Warning: This operation will also delete all calibration points and region data for this layer, and cannot be undone!
messages.select_map_and_layer: Please select map and layer first
messages.window_size_too_small: Window size cannot be smaller than 200x200
messages.set_zoom_in_hotkey_prompt: Please press the hotkey you want to set for 'Zoom In'
messages.set_zoom_out_hotkey_prompt: Please press the hotkey you want to set for 'Zoom Out'
messages.overlay_hotkey_set_success: Overlay hotkey has been set to: {key_name}
messages.zoom_in_hotkey_set_success: Zoom in hotkey has been set to: {key_name}
messages.zoom_out_hotkey_set_success: Zoom out hotkey has been set to: {key_name}
messages.select_export_map: Please select a map to export first
messages.height_min_max_error: Minimum height must be less than maximum height
messages.base_map_exists_convert_prompt:
A base map already exists: '{current_name}'

Do you want to convert it to a floor map and set '{new_name}' as the new base map?

Warning: All existing region markings will be deleted (regions are tied to the base map).

Yes: Convert and swap base maps
No: Cancel this operation
messages.base_map_swapped: Base map has been changed. All region markings have been cleared.
messages.cannot_convert_base_map_message:
Cannot directly convert the base map to a floor map.

If you want to change which layer is the base map:
1. Import or create a new layer as base map
2. The system will automatically convert the old base map to floor map
messages.import_auto_fix_no_base_map:
Auto-fix applied: No base map found in import data.
Layer 0 has been set as the base map.
messages.import_auto_fix_no_base_map_first:
Auto-fix applied: No base map found and no layer 0.
The first layer has been set as the base map.
messages.import_auto_fix_multiple_base_maps:
Auto-fix applied: Multiple base maps found in import data.
Layer 0 (or first layer) has been kept as base map, others converted to floor maps.

paths.help_text:
Screenshot folder: Location where Tarkov game screenshots are saved (usually in Documents/Escape from Tarkov)
Logs folder: Location of Tarkov game logs (usually in the Logs folder under the game installation directory)

These paths are used for the position tracking functionality of the local map module.

messages.save_success: Settings saved and applied to all modules
